articles.author: Anand Krishnamoorthy, Andre Janse Van Vuuren
articles.title: Asian Stocks Rise as Global Gauge Hits New Peak: Markets Wrap - Bloomberg.com
articles.description: A record-breaking rally in global stocks faltered after the Bank of Japan’s decision to begin selling its massive exchange-traded fund holdings dragged Asian shares lower.
articles.content:
A record-breaking rally in global stocks faltered after the Bank of Japans decision to begin selling its massive exchange-traded fund holdings dragged Asian shares lower.
